sect4.title: libtool
sect4.para: Libtool provides generalized library-building support services.

sect4.title: libtoolize
sect4.para: libtoolize provides a standard way to add libtool support to a package.

sect4.title: libltdl
sect4.para: Libtool provides a small library, called `libltdl', that aims at hiding the various difficulties of dlopening libraries from programmers.
